arm_group.description: Sage extract, 3400 mg , DER 1:17, in once daily application over 12 weeks treatment phase
Placebo,  matching  the verum in size and appearance, in once daily application over   12 weeks  treatment phase

brief_summary.textblock:
Sage tablets ( 3400 mg extract from fresh sage leaves, DER 1:17)  in a once daily
      application over 12 treatment weeks are compared against placebo in 200 menopausal patients
      with ≥ 5 hot flushes daily and a Hyperhidrosis Scale score ≥ 2

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Sage Tablets Compared to Placebo in Menopausal Patients With Hot Flushes and Sweating

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Menopausal since ≥ 1 year

          -  ≥ 5 hot flushes /24 hours

          -  Hyperhidrosis Scale score ≥ 2

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Affections like asthma, COPD, depression, diabetes, epilepsy, hyper- and
             hypothyreosis, malign tumours

clinical_study.keyword: menopause, hot flushes, hot flashes, salvia, sage, sweating
clinical_study.official_title: Multicentric, Randomized, Double Blind Study for Assessment of Efficacy and Tolerability of Sage Tablets Compared to Placebo in Menopausal Patients With Hot Flushes and Sweating

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline Hyperhidrosis Disease Severity Scale

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline Menopause Rating Scale / MRS
Change from Baseline Modified Dem Tect

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment
